full_threads.body: This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hi Dimitri,

I hope all is well.

We are looking into performhr form not saving to pdwise.

We have put a fallback in place to determine the response from pdwise.

Also we can't see the pdwise > performhr as well. Would you be able to adjust my email and also want to check if the key is correct?
Yes - all set. I'll reply to Dimitri now. 🙏

https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/2923706295/152144

@andy Let me know if I can close this.

@joel - I can answer his first question.

Do you know the answer to his second Q is (why this lead did not push to pdwise)?

Hi Andy,

It seems I got that email but you sent the reply to Annette instead of replying to this thread? Moving forward, please reply to emails sent via hello@wolf as this is our dedicated ticket support address and if email threads are unresponded too, I assume tasks to be incomplete.

Furthermore, can you please answer my query regarding why this lead did not push to pdwise?

Thanks,
Dimitri

Hey Dimitri,

We got your email (attached) and looks like you didn't get the email below from Monday?

We made sure that Annette's and Carol's email addresses are set as the recipients for the submission notifications.

Could you please confirm if they received the notification?

Thanks,
Andy
I can reply to this one.

Hi Team,

Can I please get a follow up? I keep following up and nobody answers...

Thanks,
Dimitri

Hi Dimitri,

I’ve made sure that Annette’s and Carol’s email addresses are set as the recipients for the submission notifications. I also submitted a test form to verify.

Could you please confirm if they received the notification?

Hi Team,

This is an example of an enquiry which was not sent to Annette's email on submission but also did not push into pdwise with the tag (L&D).



We need to look into this ASAP.

Thanks,
Dimitri
Dimitri Galanis

Managing Director

Hi Dimitri,

Hope you had a great weekend!

This was already addressed and completed on April 22.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or if there’s anything else you need assistance with.

Hi Team,

Following up on this please?

Thanks,
Dimitri

Hi Dimitri,

This has already been addressed as part of Annette’s previous email request.

Please let me know if you need any further assistance.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,

For all PerformHR landing pages + main website we need to ensure all enquiries via all forms are going to carol@performhr.com.au & Annette.Tesoriero@performhr.com.au on successful submission. This should be sent via the native Gravity Form/CF7 submission in addition to the pdwise integrations we set up recently.

Carol/Annette do not use pdwise and are old school hence why we need to ensure they are receiving the new enquiries as they are made. Can you confirm this is set-up correctly on your end?

Thank you,
Dimitri

--

Dimitri Galanis

Managing Director
